category-def.name: Workbench
category-def.label: Tigerstripe Modeling Workbench (Recommended)
category-def.description: This is the Tigerstripe Modeling Workbench Feature, including the complete MDD environment including support for modeling, diagrams, content generation, import/export, etc.

category-def.name: Framework
category-def.label: Tigerstripe Framework Components (included in Workbench)
category-def.description: These features are included in the modeling workbench, but can be downloaded separately for custom installs and other needs.
